鵮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiān］
［《廣韻》苦咸切，平咸，溪。］
［《廣韻》竹咸切，平咸，知。］
“鹐1”的繁体字。
(1)鸟啄物。
(2)讥刺。

鵮字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵮； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1492第08
【廣韻】苦咸切【集韻】丘咸切，?音嵁。鳥啄物也。又【廣韻】竹咸切【集韻】知咸切，?音詀。義同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵮; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1492 Page 08
[Guangyun] Bitter and salty cut [Jiyun] Qiu salty cut,? Yinchan. Birds pecks things too. Also [Guangyun] Bamboo Salty Cut [Jiyun] Knows salty cut,? Yinqin. The same meaning.
